content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe one way reform movements responded to economic conditions from 1880 to 1920. Briefly explain one similarity in how two reform movements attempted to change United States society from 1880 to 1920. Briefly explain one difference in how two reform movements attempted to change United States society from 1880 to 1920.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
